attributes.action: £80 million for yacht to be spent elsewhere
attributes.additional_details:
We are supposed to be a country in debt.  I propose we do not spend £80 million on a new yacht for the queen. Why not put the money to better use elsewhere?  Build a new hospital for instance and call it the 'Jubilee Hospital', improve schools or........pay of some of Britains debt

I think the Queen would agree if you ask her.
